title: ADAdu ashangAdu vA kaNNA
sahitya:
ADAdu ashangAdu vA kaNNA un ADalin irEzhu bhuvanamum ashaindu ashaindADudE enavE


anupallavi

  ADalaik-kANa tillai ambalat-tiraivanum tan ADalai viTTu ingE gOkulam vandAr 
			(madhyamakAlam)
AdalinAl shiru yAdavanE oru mAmayiliragNi mAdhavanE nI


caraNam     cinnam shiru padangaL shilambolittiDumE adai shevimaDuttap-piravi manam kaLittiDumE 
nAn pinniya shaDai shaTrE vaghaik-kalaindiDumE mayil pIli ashiandashaindu nilaik-kalaindiDumE 
panniru kai iraivan Erumayil onru tan pashum tOghai virittADi parishaLittiDumE kuzhal
				(madhyamakAlam)
pADi varum azhagA unaik-kANavarum aDiyAr evarAyinum kanaka maNI 
ashaiyum unadu tiru naTanam kaN paTTup-pOnAl manam puNpaTTu pOghumE
